mainText:
My heart aches at the passing of Steve Jobs, as if he was a member of my fam
ily.  A true genius, visionary, creative Renaissance man.  A loss for all, but what we have all gained from his uncanny genius is immeasurable.

I write this on my iPad, surrounded by my iPhone, iMac, Apple TV, MacBook Pro.

RIP, Steve.  You will be missed, but your legacy lives on.  You have single-
handedly changed the way we live.

With best wishes to his family and his Apple Family.
author: Judy
